00040 #ifndef _resourceinputstream_h
00041 #define _resourceinputstream_h
00042 
00043 #include "crossplatformexport.h"
00044 #include "world.h"
00045 
00046 #include <istream>
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050         //Forward Declarations
00051         namespace internal
00052         {
00053                 class OgreDataStreamBuf;
00054         }
00055         class ResourceManager;
00056 
00057         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058         /// @class ResourceInputStream
00059         /// @headerfile resourceinputstream.h
00060         /// @brief A stream from a file, can read from zip files as well
00061         /// @warning This currently only supports reading from the stream, and does not support any pointer navigation, or any other non-reading functions
00062         /// @details
00063         class PHYS_LIB ResourceInputStream : public std::istream
00064         {
00065                 private:
00066                         internal::OgreDataStreamBuf* OgreBuffer;
00067                         ResourceManager* Manager;
00068 
00069                         /// @internal
00070                         /// @brief Called by the constructors to actually construct this class
00071                         /// @param InputBuffer A pointer to an internal::OgreDataStreamBuf. A buffer to read from the disk access subsystem (which happens to be part of Ogre). This Stream will assume ownership of this buffer and will handle deleting it.
00072                         /// @param ResourceManager_ Currently unused, future functionality may tuse this.
00073                         void Construct(std::streambuf *InputBuffer, ResourceManager* ResourceManager_);
00074 
00075                 protected:
00076 
00077                 public:
00078                         /// @brief Descriptive Constructor
00079                         /// @param InputBuffer A pointer to an internal::OgreDataStreamBuf. A buffer to read from the disk access subsystem (which happens to be part of Ogre). This Stream will assume ownership of this buffer and will handle deleting it.
00080                         /// @param ResourceManager_ Currently unused, future functionality may tuse this.
00081                         /// @warning Do not delete the InputBuffer you pass in, this class will assume owner ship and delete it on it's own
00082                         ResourceInputStream(std::streambuf *InputBuffer, ResourceManager* ResourceManager_) :
00083                                 std::istream(InputBuffer)
00084                                 { this->Construct(InputBuffer, ResourceManager_); }
00085 
00086                         /// @brief Tears down the Stream, and Delete the Buffer Passed in.
00087                         virtual ~ResourceInputStream();
00088 
00089                         /// @brief Can this be read from
00090                         /// @return A bool true if it can be read from
00091                         bool Readable();
00092 
00093                         /// @brief Can this be written to
00094                         /// @return A bool true if it can be written to
00095                         bool Writeable();
00096 
00097                         template<class T> ResourceInputStream& operator >> ( T& Data )
00098                         {
00099                 std::istream* temp = static_cast<std::istream*>(this);
00100                                 (*temp) >> Data;
00101                                 return *this;
00102                         }
00103         }; // \ResourceInputStream
00104 } // \phys
00105 
00106 #endif
